description:
What might give Canada a competitive edge in the world of gas exports? Stewart Muir of Resource Works seems to think the Mackenzie River Delta might make a good location for a future LNG (liquified natural gas) terminal. “The flexibility of gas in Canada, where it’s located, is really an all-coast opportunity,” said Muir at […]

The post Gas Lobbyists Want LNG Expansion in Canada’s Arctic appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Gas Lobbyists Want LNG Expansion in Canada’s Arctic
